column2: z1_cat <- z_score(x = cat, mu = mu_cats, sig = sd_cats)
z2_dog <- z_score(x = dog, mu = mu_dogs, sig = sd_dogs)
paste0("A cat weighing 432 grams is 2 standard deviations BELOW the mean")
"A cat weighing 432 grams is 2 standard deviations BELOW the mean"
paste0("A dog weighing is 1123 grams is 2.14 standard deviations BELOW the mean")
"A dog weighing is 1123 grams is 2.14 standard deviations BELOW the mean"
paste0("Because |𝑧2_dog |=-2.14 <|𝑧1_cat |=-2, cat with weight 432 grams is more unusual than dog with weight 1123 grams")
"Because |\U0001d4672_dog |=-2.14 <|\U0001d4671_cat |=-2, cat with weight 432 grams is more unusual than dog with weight 1123 grams"
